## 🛒 For Buyers

::: {.panel-tabset .animated.fadeIn}

### 📊 Current Market Conditions

The local real estate market remains highly competitive, with a median home price of **$859,000** and an average of **52 days on market**. Buyers should be prepared to act quickly when desirable properties become available.

### 💰 Financing Tips

- ✅ Get pre-approved for a mortgage before starting your search.
- ✅ Shop multiple lenders for competitive rates.
- ✅ Explore down payment assistance programs available locally.

### 🗓 Typical Timelines

- 📅 Average escrow: **30-45 days**
- 🔎 Inspections usually scheduled within first 10 days.

### 🎯 Buyer Strategies

- Be flexible on closing timelines.
- Include a strong earnest money deposit.
- Partner with a trusted local agent for negotiation strength.

:::

---

## 🏠 For Sellers

::: {.panel-tabset .animated.fadeIn}

### 💵 Pricing Strategy

- 📈 Accurate pricing is critical.
- ❌ Overpricing leads to stagnation.
- 📊 Use a professional CMA for proper valuation.

### 🖼 Staging & Presentation

- ✨ Declutter and depersonalize.
- 📸 High-quality photos dramatically improve online visibility.
- 🌳 Curb appeal helps drive foot traffic.

### 🗓 Expected Days on Market

- 🕰 Median time: **31 days**
- 🏃‍♂️ Properly priced homes often sell quickly in first 2-3 weeks.

### 🤝 Negotiation Strategies

- 🤝 Stay responsive to all offers.
- 💼 Reasonable flexibility improves deal success.
- 🎁 Consider closing cost contributions when appropriate.

:::
